title: CIVIL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)	'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.
(ii)	ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject

title: ELECTRICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)      'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics.

 ND/HND in Elect Eng. Upper/Lower credit respectively.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and English Language.

title: ENVIRONMENTAL MANAGEMENT & POLLUTION CONTROL
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and any one of Biology, Agricultural Science, Botany and Zoology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Biology Science, Physics and Mathematics.

title: FISHERIES & AQUACULTURE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in any of Chemistry, Biology, Botany, Zoology, Agricultural Science Geography, Mathematics (pure & applied), Physics, Geology and Economics.

 

(ii)NCE Agriculture
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Biology/Agricultural Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and English Language plus any other Science subject.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and any other Science subject.

title: MARINE ECONOMICS & FINANCE
de_requirements:
(i)       'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)     ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject

title: MARINE ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)       'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)     ND/HND upper credit at appropriate levels.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject .

title: MARINE GEOLOGY
de_requirements: (i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Geology, Chemistry, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Geography.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any other subject.
subjects: Any three (3) of Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics, Biology and Geography.

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)        Two (2) 'A' Level passes from Chemistry, Physics and Mathematics.

(ii)       ND upper credit, NCE technical and HND in Mech. Engineering.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any other Science subject.

title: METEOROLOGY & CLIMATE CHANGE
de_requirements:
(i) ND upper credit in Meteorology in addition to the 'O' Level requirements.  OR

(ii)WMO Class II Certificate in Weather Forecasting in     addition to the 'O' Level requirements.

(iii) 'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics in addition to the SSC requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Physics, Mathematics and English Language and either Chemistry or Geography

title: METEOROLOGY AND CLIMATE CHANGE
de_requirements:
(i)       'A' Level passes in Mathematics and Physics.

(ii)      ND upper credit level in Meteorology.

NMO Class II Certificate in Weather Forecasting, plus 'O' Level SSC requirements
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including Physics, Mathematics. English Language and either Chemistry or Geography

title: NAUTICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes in any two (2) of  Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry
utme_requirements: 'A' Level passes in any two (2) of  Mathematics, Physics and Chemistry

title: PETROLEUM & GAS ENGINEERING
de_requirements: 'A' Level passes to include Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credits to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and any one Science subject.

title: PORT MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i)     Two ‘A’ level passes in Physics/Mathematics/Economics/Geography.

ii)             OND/HND in Estate Management, Quantity Surveying, Building Tech and Engineering (Upper/Lower credit).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics,  Physics plus a pass in Chemistry and either Economics  or  Biology.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one of Chemistry, Economics and Biology.

title: TRANSPORT LOGISTICS MANAGEMENT
de_requirements:
(i)     Two ‘A’ level passes in Physics/Mathematics/Economics/Geography.

ii)             OND/HND in Estate Management, Quantity Surveying, Building Tech and Engineering (Upper/Lower credit).
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSCE credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics,  Physics plus a pass in Chemistry and either Economics  or  Biology.
subjects: Mathematics, Physics and one of Chemistry, Economics and Biology.
